page.title: 14PANSHANGER GOLF CLUB
page.content: I go to Panshanger golf club.I go on the pitch and putt.It is a 9 hole course and it doubles back at the 6th.There are not many bunkers but on the 6th there is one that goes straight across the green.I do not like the 6th because it has tight trees on one side.The first second and third are nice short holes.The longest hole I think is the 8th because it has a short dogleg.I play with my dad.It takes about 20mins to go round.I play with my own clubs.Sometimes the greens are not good because the greenkeeper tries to get the greens good for the summer.Sometimes there are temporary greens that are no good. I can not putt very well. {NIKKI BRYAN.(10)
